Ok here's the reading order for those asking : Chapter 0 to 4 : https://nhentai.net/g/294399/ Chapter 1.5 : https://nhentai.net/g/193905/ Chapter 4.5 : https://nhentai.net/g/200958/ Chapter 5 : https://nhentai.net/g/228018/ Chapter 5.5 (ExE 14) : https://nhentai.net/g/295464/ Chapter 6 (ExE 9) : https://nhentai.net/g/228019/ Chapter 7-8.5 (ExE 11-13) : https://nhentai.net/g/243948/ Chapter 9-10 (ExE 15, 19): https://nhentai.net/g/306758/ Chapter 11 (ExE 20) : https://nhentai.net/g/326639/ Chapter 12 (ExE 24) : https://nhentai.net/g/321653/ Chapter 13 (ExE 25) : thisThere you have it. Hope it helps and clear some confusion.

I've seen the cover of a lot of the chapters of this series but I still haven't read it. Is it a harem? And does it have a clear chapter order?

You know, I'm kinda surprised that Kuroda hasn't at least attempted to hook up with one of the girls, especially Kumiko who flat out says to his face she is in love with him and he doesn't remotely respond to it. Like he doesn't deny her or anything. IDK, I just want the MC to make his decision on who he wants to be with, be it all of them or just one (hopefully Satsuki after she divorces her husband). I WANT A DEFINITIVE CONCLUSIVE ENDING, NO OPEN ENDINGS ALLOWED!
Keeping that harem in rotation just like them sneakers ;)
